mapper.select: SELECT vt.vctn_type_num, vt.vctn_name, dept_table.code_value deptValue, rank_table.code_value rankValue, vt.vctn_time, vt.deduction_day FROM vacation_type vt INNER JOIN code_table rank_table ON vt.rank = rank_table.code_name INNER JOIN code_table dept_table ON vt.dept = dept_table.code_name order by vt.vctn_type_num
mapper.update: update vacation_type set vctn_name = #{vctn_name}, dept=#{dept}, rank=#{rank},vctn_time=#{vctn_time}, deduction_day=#{deduction_day} where vctn_type_num = #{vctn_type_num}
